instructions.step: Melt the butter in a saucepan and cook the onion and celery gently for 8-10 minutes, until really softened. Add the garlic and cook for a further minute.
Tip in the chopped tomatoes, sugar and stock, and bring to a simmer. Cook gently for 15-20 minutes, then place in a blender or food processor and whizz until smooth.
Return to the saucepan and add the horseradish and two-thirds of the cream, then heat through really gently.
Serve in warm bowls with an extra swirl of cream and some ground black pepper on top.
